00027 int isvalid(char *name)
00028         {
00029         int i;
00030         if(isdigit(*name))
00031                 return 0;
00032         i=1;
00033         while(*(name+i) !='\0') 
00034                 {
00035                 if(*(name+i) ==' ')
00036                         return 0;
00037                 i++;
00038                 }
00039         return 1;
00040         }
00041 void clearclient();
00042 _form_def :: edit_form()
00043         {
00044         main_window *edit;
00045         edit = new main_window;
00046         edit->t_win_y->setval(y);
00047         edit->t_win_x->setval(x);
00048         edit->t_win_w->setval(wd);
00049         edit->t_win_h->setval(ht);
00050         edit->t_win_n->setval(name);
00051         edit->t_win_t->setval(title);
00052         strcpy(edit->title," Edit Form ");
00053         
00054         run:
00055         edit->run();
00056         if(!isvalid(edit->t_win_n->text))
00057                                 {
00058                                         sprintf(message,ln_notvalid,edit->t_win_n->text);
00059                                             messagebox(message,MSG_ALERT);
00060                                     goto run;
00061                                 }
00062 
00063         // re-apply the changed value
00064         x=str2int(edit->t_win_x->text);
00065         y=str2int(edit->t_win_y->text);
00066         wd=str2int(edit->t_win_w->text);
00067         if(wd <80)
00068         wd=80;
00069         ht=str2int(edit->t_win_h->text);
00070         if(ht<title_bar_height)
00071         ht=title_bar_height;
00072         strcpy(name,edit->t_win_n->text);
00073         strcpy(title,edit->t_win_t->text);
00074         delete edit;
00075         virx=x+86;
00076         viry=y+40;
00077         changed=true;
00078         clearclient();
00079         show_form();
00080 
00081         }

00083 void _form_def::showstatus()
00084                         {

00087                         gdriver.draw_3dbar(fx,fy+20,fwd,fht,5,5,1,2);

00089                         outtextxy(fx+10,fy+8," Status ");

00091                         if(!loaded)
00092                         outtextxy(fx,fy+20+10,"NotLoaded");

00094                         {  //do rest
00095                                 char str[50];

00097                                         {
00098                                         case 10 : outtextxy(fx+1,fy+20+18,"Mode : BG"); break;
00099                                         case 01 : outtextxy(fx+1,fy+20+18,"Mode : FG"); break;

00101                         }

00105         _form_def::contains(int _type)
00106                 {
00107                         int i=0;
00108                  int length = control_list.getsize();
00109 
00110                  while(i<length)
00111                  {
00112                  if((control_list.getitem(i+1))->type == _type)
00113                          return true;
00114                  i++;
00115                  }
00116                  i=0;
00117                  length = back_control_list.getsize();
00118                  while(i<length)
00119                  {
00120                  if((back_control_list.getitem(i+1))->type == _type)
00121                          return true;
00122                  i++;
00123                  }
00124                  
00125                  return false;
00126                 }

00128         _form_def::contains(char  _name[128])
00129                 {
00130                 resume_dog();

00132                         int i=0;
00133                  int length = control_list.getsize();
00134                         
00135                  while(i<length)
00136                  {
00137                  control_handler = control_list.getitem(i+1);
00138                          switch(control_handler->type)
00139                                 {
00140                                 case C_BUTTON:
00141 
00142                                         if(strcmp(((f_button *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00143                                                    return true;
00144                                         
00145                                 break;
00146                                 case C_LABEL:
00147                                         if(strcmp(((f_label *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00148                                                                  return true;
00149                                   break;
00150                                 case C_TEXTBOX:
00151                                         if(strcmp(((f_textbox *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00152                                                                          return true;
00153                                 break;
00154                                                                 case C_CBOX:
00155                                         if(strcmp(((f_cbox *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00156                                                                          return true;
00157                                 break;
00158                                 case C_OPTION:
00159                                         if(strcmp(((f_option *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00160                                                                          return true;
00161                                 break;
00162 
00163                                                         }
00164                                         i++;
00165                                 
00166                               }
00167                           i=0;
00168               length = back_control_list.getsize();
00169                         
00170                  while(i<length)
00171                  {
00172                  control_handler = back_control_list.getitem(i+1);
00173                          switch(control_handler->type)
00174                                 {
00175                                 case C_FRAME:
00176                                 
00177                                         if(strcmp(((f_frame *)control_list.getitem(i+1))->name,_name) == 0)
00178                                                    return true;
00179                                         
00180                                 break;
00181 
00182                                                         }
00183                                         i++;
00184                                 
00185                               }
00186                          
00187                               dog("Failed search ");
00188                               close_dog();
00189                               return false;
00190                               }
00191         int _form_def::right_clicked(_mouse m)
00192                 {
00193                  int i; 
00194                  int length; 
00195                  int done=false;
00196                  if(m.x>virx && m.x<virx+wd && m.y>viry &&m.y<viry+title_bar_height)
00197                         edit_form();
00198                  // for backgound items .. 
00199                  if(mode == 10)
00200                         {
00201                                                 i=0;
00202                                 length = back_control_list.getsize();
00203                                  
00204                              region control;
00205                                  point p(m.x,m.y);
00206                          
00207                                  gdriver.savescreen(virx,viry,virx+wd,viry+ht);

00209                                  {
00210                                  control_handler = back_control_list.getitem(i+1);
00211                                  control.setval(virx+control_handler->left,
00212                                                                viry+title_bar_height+control_handler->top,

00214                                                                viry+title_bar_height+control_handler->top+control_handler->height);

00217

00222                 
00223                                                 break;

00225                                                         edit_dialog((f_line*) control_handler);
00226                 
00227                                                 break;
00228                                                 }
00229                 
00230                 
00231                 
00232                             done = true;
00233                             } //end of if
00234         
00235                                     /* checking for the mouse over any control */
00236         
00237                             i++;
00238                             } // end of while                   
00239                         }
00240                  else
00241                         {
00242                         i=0;
00243                         length = control_list.getsize();
00244                          
00245                      region control;
00246                          point p(m.x,m.y);
00247

00597                                                                         str2int(new_frame->t_w->text),
00598                                                                         str2int(new_frame->t_h->text),
00599                                                                     str2int(new_frame->t_bg->text),
00600                                                                      str2int(new_frame->t_c->text),
00601                                                                       str2int(new_frame->t_bor->text),
00602                                                                         new_frame->t_lab->text);
00603 
00604 
00605                                 back_control_list.insert((control *)frame_handler);
00606 
00607                        
00608                           delete new_frame;
00609                           show_form();
00610                           
00611                 }
00612          _form_def::edit_dialog(f_frame * dummy)
00613                 {//bn^x^y^w^h^c^frame
00614 
00615 
00616                              frame_details *new_frame;
00617                              new_frame=new frame_details(true);
00618                               new_frame->t_x->setval(dummy->left);
00619                             new_frame->t_y->setval(dummy->top);
00620                             new_frame->t_w->setval(dummy->width);
00621                             new_frame->t_h->setval(dummy->height);
00622                             new_frame->t_c->setval(dummy->color);
00623                               new_frame->t_bg->setval(dummy->bgcolor);
00624                                 new_frame->t_bor->setval(dummy->border);
00625                             new_frame->t_lab->setval(dummy->label);
00626                              new_frame->t_name->setval(dummy->name);
00627 
00628                                 strcpy(new_frame->title,"Edit frame");
00629                              run:
00630                             
00631                              delay(150);
00632 
00633                              new_frame->run();
00634                                                         if(new_frame ->del == true)
00635                                 {
00636                                 back_control_list.remove((control *)dummy);
00637                              //         control_list.display();
00638                              // getch();
00639                                 
00640                                 delete new_frame;
00641                                 return 1;
00642                                 }
00643                             
00644                                 if(new_frame->status == CANCEL_CWIN)
00645                                                                          {
00646                                                                          delete new_frame;
00647                                                                          return 1;
00648                                                                          }
00649                                         //        cout<<w->t1->text;
00650                                 
00651                                         if(!isvalid(new_frame->t_name->text))
00652                                         {
00653                                                 sprintf(message,ln_notvalid,new_frame->t_name->text);
00654                                                                         messagebox(message,MSG_ALERT);
00655                                                                         goto run;
00656                                         }
00657                         
00658 
00659            dummy->left=new_frame->t_x->value;
00660                                     dummy->top=new_frame->t_y->value;
00661                                     dummy->width=new_frame->t_w->value;
00662                                     dummy->height=new_frame->t_h->value;
00663                                    dummy->color=new_frame->t_c->value;
00664                                     dummy->bgcolor=new_frame->t_bg->value;
00665                                      dummy->border=new_frame->t_bor->value;
00666                                     strcpy(dummy->label,new_frame->t_lab->text);
00667                                     strcpy(dummy->name,new_frame->t_name->text);
00668                                 // create the widget at the form ..
00669                                 //bn^x^y^w^h^c^frame
00670                         /*    edit_record(num,"lb",str2int(new_frame->t_x->text)
00671                                     ,str2int(new_frame->t_y->text)
00672                                     ,str2int(new_frame->t_w->text)
00673                                     ,str2int(new_frame->t_h->text)
00674                                     ,str2int(new_frame->t_c->text)
00675                                     ,new_frame->t_lab->text);*/
00676                          delete new_frame;    //deletes the window ..
00677                 }

01007 
01008      
01009         void _form_def::place(int item,point p)
01010                 {
01011                 delay(500);
01012                 while(1)
01013                         {
01014                         mouse.getresponse();
01015                         if(mouse.btn & 1)
01016                              {
01017                              point p(mouse.x,mouse.y);
01018                              region form(virx,viry+15,virx+wd,viry+ht);
01019                              if(form.contains(p))
01020                                         {
01021                                        //        cout<< " wai t .. ";
01022                                        //        getch();
01023 
01024                              if(item == 1)
01025                              {
01026                                new_btn_diag(p);
01027                         break;
01028                         }
01029                         else if(item == 2)
01030                              {
01031                                new_label_diag(p);
01032                         break;
01033                         }
01034                         else if(item ==3)
01035                                 {
01036                                 new_text_diag(p);
01037                                 break;
01038                                 }
01039                         else if(item ==4)
01040                                                         {
01041                                                         new_cbox_diag(p);
01042                                                         break;
01043                                                         }
01044                                                 else if(item == 5)      
01045                                                         {
01046                                                         new_optn_diag(p);
01047                                                         break; // option
01048                                                         }
01049                                                 else if(item == 6)      
01050                                                         {
01051                                                         
01052                                                         if(mode == 01)
01053                                                                 {
01054                                                                 messagebox("This Works only on Background mode",MSG_ALERT);
01055                                                                 break;
01056                                                                 }
01057                                                                 new_frame_diag(p);
01058                                                         break; // frame
01059                                                         }
01060                                                 else if(item == 7)
01061                                                         {
01062 
01063                                                         if(mode == 01)
01064                                                                 {
01065                                                                 messagebox("This Works only on Background mode",MSG_ALERT);
01066                                                                 break;
01067                                                                 }
01068                                                                 new_line_diag(p);
01069                                                         break; // frame
01070                                                         }
01071 
01072                                         }
01073                             }
01074 
01075                         if(mouse.btn & 2)
01076                                 break;
01077                         }
01078                 }
01079 
01080 
01081 
01082 
01083        _form_def::new_btn_diag(point p)
01084                 {
01085                                 bttn_details *new_bttn;
01086                              new_bttn=new bttn_details;
01087                               char buf[50];
01088                                  sprintf(buf,"%d",p.x-virx);
01089                                  strcpy(new_bttn->t_x->text,buf);
01090                                  sprintf(buf,"%d",p.y-viry-title_bar_height);
01091                                  strcpy(new_bttn->t_y->text,buf);
01092                              run:
01093                              new_bttn->run();
01094                                 if(new_bttn->status == CANCEL_CWIN)
01095                                                                          {
01096                                                                          delete new_bttn;
01097                                                                          return 1;
01098                                                                          }
01099                                 if(!isvalid(new_bttn->t_name->text))
01100                                         {
01101                                                 sprintf(message,ln_notvalid,new_bttn->t_name->text);
01102                                                                         messagebox(message,MSG_ALERT);
01103                                                                         goto run;
01104                                         }
01105                                 if(contains(new_bttn->t_name->text))
01106                                                                                 {
01107                                                                                 sprintf(message,ln_cntrl_name_choosen,new_bttn->t_name->text);
01108                                                                                 messagebox(message,MSG_INFO);
01109                                                                                 goto run;
01110                                                                                 }
01111                                 bttn_handler=new f_button(new_bttn->t_name->text,str2int(new_bttn->t_x->text),
01112                                                                           str2int(new_bttn->t_y->text),
01113                                                                         str2int(new_bttn->t_w->text),
01114                                                                         str2int(new_bttn->t_h->text),
01115                                                                         9,
01116                                                                         str2int(new_bttn->t_c->text),
01117                                                                         new_bttn->t_lab->text);
01118                                                                                 sprintf(buf,"The current Heap size is %ld",heapsize());
01119 
01120                                 control_list.insert((control *)bttn_handler);
01121                          delete new_bttn;    //deletes the window ..
01122                            show_form();
01123                 }
01124 
01125         int _form_def::draw_controls()
01126                 {
01127 
01128 
01129                  int i=0;
01130                  setviewport(virx,viry+title_bar_height,virx+wd,viry+ht,1);
01131              // setcolor(4)  ;
01132               //rectangle(virx,viry+title_bar_height,virx+wd,viry+ht);
01133                 
01134                 int length = back_control_list.getsize();
01135                 
01136                 while(i<length)
01137                         {
01138                         control_handler=back_control_list.getitem(i+1);
01139                         switch(control_handler->type)
01140                                 {
01141                                 case C_FRAME:
01142                                         ((f_frame*)control_handler)->draw();
01143                                         
01144                                 break;
01145                                 case C_LINE:
01146                                         ((f_line*)control_handler)->draw();
01147                                 break;
01148                                 
01149                                 }
01150                         i++;
01151                         }
01152                
01153                                 i=0;
01154                                 length = control_list.getsize();
01155                         
01156                 
01157                                 while(i<length)
01158                                 
01159                         {
01160                         control_handler=control_list.getitem(i+1);
01161                         switch(control_handler->type)
01162                                 {
01163                                 case C_BUTTON:
01164                                                                                  
01165                                         bttn_handler=(f_button *)control_handler;
01166                                        bttn_handler->draw();
01167                                     
01168                                 break;
01169                                 case C_LABEL:
01170                                                                                 lab_handler=(f_label *)control_handler;
01171                                         lab_handler->draw();
01172                                 break;
01173                                 case C_CBOX:
01174                                                                                 cbox_handler=(f_cbox *)control_handler;
01175                                         cbox_handler->draw();
01176                                                                 break;
01177                                 case C_TEXTBOX:
01178                                         tb_handler=(f_textbox *)control_handler;
01179                                         tb_handler->draw();
01180                                 break;
01181                                 case C_OPTION:
01182                                        option_handler=(f_option *)control_handler;
01183                                        option_handler->draw();
01184                                 break;
01185                                 }
01186                         i++;
01187                         }
01188                 setviewport(0,0,getmaxx(),getmaxy(),1);
01189                 
01190                
01191                 }
01192 
01193 
01194 
01195 void _form_def::show_form()
01196         {
01197                 
01198                 if(changed)
01199                 {
01200         
01201                 changed = false;
01202         int dec=2;
01203         clearclient();
01204         gdriver.draw_3dbar(virx,viry,wd,ht,bgcolor,15,1,dec,-1);
01205         gdriver.draw_bar(virx+dec+1,viry+dec,wd-dec-3,15,1,1);
01206         mouse.hide();
01207                  settextjustify(CENTER_TEXT,RIGHT_TEXT);
01208                  setcolor(15);
01209                  settextstyle(0,0,1);
01210                  /* for title adjustment */
01211                  char _title[50];
01212                  strcpy(_title,title);
01213                  if(textwidth(title)>wd)
01214                         {
01215                          _title[wd/(textwidth(_title)/strlen(_title)+1)]='\0';
01216                         }
01217                  gdriver.draw_bar(virx+wd-15,viry+dec+3,8,10,10,0);
01218                  setcolor(15);
01219                  outtextxy((2*virx+wd)/2,viry+dec+3,_title);
01220                 settextjustify(LEFT_TEXT,TOP_TEXT);
01221              
01222 gdriver.savescreen(virx,viry,virx+wd,viry+ht,_form_pic);
01223         draw_controls();  
01224         mouse.show();
01225         }
01226         else
01227         {
01228         // simply restore it ... 
01229         gdriver.restorescreen(virx,viry,virx+wd,viry+ht,_form_pic);
01230         draw_controls();
01231                 }  
01232         showstatus();
01233         }
